Smart Sleeping Bag: A sleeping bag that tracks your sleep patterns and provides personalized recommendations on how to improve your sleep. It can also play soothing sounds or provide guided meditations to help you relax and fall asleep.
Solar-Powered Sleeping Bag: A sleeping bag that uses solar panels to charge your phone and other electronic devices while you sleep. This can be especially useful when camping or hiking.

Sleeping Bag: A sleeping bag that is designed to be used in different types of environments, including camping, backpacking, and even your living room. It can be easily inflated or deflated, making it easy to transport and store.
Sleeping Bag with built-in WiFi: A sleeping bag that allows you to connect to the internet while you sleep. This can be useful for streaming music, watching videos, or staying connected to work.

Sleeping Bag with built-in Air Purifier: A sleeping bag that purifies the air around you while you sleep. This can be especially useful for people who suffer from allergies or have difficulty breathing while sleeping.
